I've loved playing this game since it came out all the way back in  2015, I would strongly recommend this game to any lone wolves as well as party players because you never know whats gonna happen in any given trial.
Jogo tedioso ao extremo, dinheiro botado fora ao meu ver.

If you have long hair, buy this game! My hair has never been healthier!! The queue times are the perfect lengths of time to trim my split ends without getting too bored, I suggest investing in a pair of sharp scissors. Now besides the obvious hair benefits, the game itself is fun and constantly evolving. The introduction of new maps and characters (Killers and Survivors) along with their accompanying perks, really helps keep the game new and exciting. I personally enjoy playing both killer and survivor, though survivor is much more fun when played with friends along with some sort of chat.

Wanna hate your life? Wanna get validation from absolutely nothing? PLAY DBD! So fun. Best game! Def wouldnt recommend!!!! Only play if you absolutely hate yourself. Like waiting in line IRL? PLAY DBD! Wait 10 hours for a match where you are tunneled and camped! SO FUN

I would rather say, this game is verry frustrating although i love this game, cuz with friends it is really fun. On the other hand Behaviour is doing a really bad job by not making such frustrating things banable like FACECAMPING, Tunnelling, yea of course you can make a strong build wich will help you against a toxic player but in the end it is about teamplay right? so if you want to be friendlly and help your teammates just do it. but if you decide to tryhard go ahead but do not complain when you get 5x in a row a killer who can;t handel a map as the Artist or a bubba who facecamps you 1cm away from the hook wich is extreemly funny, and only then when you end that 5th game in a row where you ran for 5 sek on a map, and dies on the first hook? well thats what i like dying every game because someone is trying a new build. I get it i get it, it is hard to make such a nice game fun to play for everyone, but god damn i hete all those f*cks who tunnel my friend when my second fleshlight runs out.

La tem√°tica de rol del juego es bastante interesante, me encanta ya que puedes ver la esencia de muchos killers plasmados aqu√≠ de una forma muy interesante, jugar con amigos y en personalizadas es una experiencia muy divertida, eso si la toxicidad y la competitividad dentro del mismo a la hora de jugar partidas emparejadas por el sistema arruina en varias ocasiones la diversi√≥n en general sin contar el hecho de que solo hay modo ranked y los emparejamientos pueden ser algo injustos si juegas solo killer cuando estas reci√©n aprendiendo, si la comunidad dejase de ser tan densa en ese sentido el juego mejorar√≠a bastante.

Um dia se isso se tornar um jogo DE VERDADE, mudo minha avalia√ß√£o :D

I really wanted to give this game a positive review.  The premise is great, the execution is (for the most part) decent, and the developer puts effort into events and specials.  Naturally it attracts toxic players, as all online games do, but it's still a fun social gaming experience - when it's actually playable, which it often isn't.  The optimisation is absolutely appalling, patches are constant and absurdly huge, the 'anti-cheat' plugin is buggy and unstable, and almost every update has to be downloaded twice because the first one invariably results in file corruption.  There's really no excuse for the state of this game, and it's such a pity because it could be excellent.  The only reason I haven't given up and uninstalled it is that I have friends who play. Sadly, I really can't recommend it in its present state.
I think everyone who plays this game hates it to some extent.

After playing this game for a while I cannot recommend this game to anyone. The devs flat out do not care and they do not listen to the community at all. If you want proof of that watch the recent Q&A the devs did. 

They constantly buff things that don't need buffs, and nerf things that don't need nerfs. It's almost like they don't play their own game. Do yourself a favor and wait for VHS to come out. Do not buy this game.

If you have 3 friends it's a fun time being a survivor and bullying killers. If you're like me and like to play killer you're in for a bad time. 

Edit: Played the recent updates where devs tried to finally make the game better. I played two games and uninstalled because I remembered why I deleted this game in the first place.

Best asymmetrical survival horror game out there currently. Devs care and address broken stuff quickly, events are fun and often, and the playerbase is active enough that finding games is rarely ever a problem.

My one recommendation is to play this game to have fun and not to "win" -- the game is never perfectly balanced so cheesing with current meta is possible, but boring. Using the same 4 perks all the time or only playing 1 killer will burn you out pretty quickly. And there is effectively no ranking system, so trying to play this like it's CS:GO ain't the way dawg.

Un ottimo gioco, unico nel suo genere. Pu√≤ essere ripetitivo, ma visto che √® un PVP giocando con una persona reale aumenta la longevit√†/divertimento all'interno del gioco. Ci sono varie mappe/oggetti tra cui, torce e cassette degli attrezzi. Purtroppo in alcune partite potreste scontrare gente altamente tossica sia da killer/survivor, infatti, lo sconsiglio a chi non riesce a mantenere la calma. Per il resto, √® davvero un bel gioco.
